Articles.Content: I'm using MechJeb and I want to ask is there a tool on it which calculates the angle of 2 bodies relative to the sun. E.g. If anyone's been on ksp.olex.biz and it tells you when to launch yourself from a planet depending on angle. Is there a tool in MechJeb to measure the angle between 2 planets?
I believe the protractor modification provides this functionality.
